title: Certaine preceptes or directions, for the well ordering and carriage of a mans life: as also Å“conomicall discipline for the gouernment of his house: with a platforme to a good foundation thereof, in the aduised choise of a wife: left by a father to his sonne at his death, who was sometimes of eminent note and place in this kingdome. And published from a more perfect copie, than ordinarily those pocket manuscripts goe unwarranted by.
author: Burghley, William Cecil, Baron, 1520-1598.
